name: tenant_id
description: Unique tenant identifier (primary key). Used for all tenant operations and data isolation.

name: company_name
description: Company or organization name for this tenant.

name: contact_email
description: Primary contact email for tenant notifications and support.

name: subscription_tier
description: Subscription tier: FREE, STARTER, PROFESSIONAL, ENTERPRISE. Determines feature access and default quotas.

name: is_active
description: Whether tenant account is active. FALSE blocks all pipeline executions and API access. Used for account suspension, non-payment, or security incidents.

name: max_pipelines_per_month
description: Maximum pipeline runs allowed per calendar month. NULL means unlimited (for enterprise tier). Enforced before every pipeline execution.

name: max_concurrent_pipelines
description: Maximum number of pipelines that can run simultaneously. NULL means unlimited. Prevents resource exhaustion.

name: pipeline_runs_count
description: Total lifetime pipeline runs executed by this tenant. Never resets. Used for billing and analytics.

name: pipeline_runs_this_month
description: Pipeline runs in current calendar month. Auto-resets to 0 on first day of each month by background job.

name: current_running_pipelines
description: Number of pipelines currently executing. Incremented on start, decremented on completion/failure.

name: last_pipeline_run_at
description: UTC timestamp of last pipeline execution. Used for identifying inactive tenants and retention analysis.

name: quota_reset_date
description: Date when monthly quota was last reset. Used to track monthly billing cycles.

name: created_at
description: UTC timestamp when tenant was onboarded. Immutable.

name: updated_at
description: UTC timestamp of last metadata update (quota changes, tier upgrades, etc.).

name: suspended_at
description: UTC timestamp when account was suspended (is_active=FALSE). NULL if never suspended or currently active.

name: suspension_reason
description: Reason for account suspension: PAYMENT_FAILED, QUOTA_EXCEEDED, SECURITY_VIOLATION, ADMIN_ACTION, etc.

name: notes
description: Internal admin notes about this tenant. Not exposed to tenant.
